author: Special Correspondent
text:
Employees State Insurance Corporation Medical College and Hospital here, which has come up at a project cost of nearly Rs. 520 crore, is expected to be functional from 2016-2017 academic year. Prime Minister Narendra Modi will inaugurate on Tuesday one of the newly-constructed blocks of the hospital. Department sources here told The Hindu that the ESIC Medical College and Hospital has four blocks and meets all the healthcare service facilities required for the medical college.

The existing 300-bed hospital has also been renovated and the entire facility will now become a 500-bed hospital.
title: ESIC hospital to be opened today
